main event: An unidentified object was observed moving rapidly and silently across the sky in San Luis Obispo, California on 09/04/1962.
interesting points: The object was seen to move from west to east at high altitude with bright lights., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 to 30 seconds., The object appeared to turn slightly southeast before fading from view., No noise or trail accompanied the object during the sighting., The report concluded the sighting could possibly be an aircraft.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with bright lights
witness description: Two civilian observers, familiar with aircraft, reported the sighting.
